description: You’ve been a bad boy haven’t you? Sneaking all the way out here and hiding in the grass, hoping to catch an eyeful of Ruckus. And nothing escapes Ruckus. He catches you in the act and decides to have some fun with you. He tells you to take out your cock and get it hard. All you can do is obey as you watch Ruckus stroke his own cock and listen to him tell you what a pathetic little back alley cum slut you are. Leaning forward you hope to catch a whiff of his body, sweaty from working in the yard all day. Maybe if you follow his every instruction he’ll let you inside. The instructions are simple, listen to his every order and don’t cum until he tells you. Think you can handle it?
title: Causing A Ruckus!
